info.title: Sourcing Project Type â€“ Read
info.description: The read-only service enables you to request information about the available sourcing project types and the text nodes for the sourcing project types. The requested information is sent as a response. You can request information about all available sourcing project types or specific ones.

x-sap-shortText: Read the available sourcing project types using this inbound synchronous service

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET SourcingProjectType HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
